quiz.collect_all_coins: You must collect all 9 coins to advance!

questions.question: Who is the alter ego of Iron Man?
Which superhero is known as the 'God of Thunder'?
What is the main color of Captain America's suit?

ironman.l1: Hey, looks like you found me. Not bad!
ironman.l2: The city is in chaos—feels like a Monday.
ironman.q1_l1: Some major tech got stolen from Stark Industries.
ironman.q1_l2: Without my suit’s AI systems, things are tough for all of us.
ironman.q1b_label: Do you know who's behind this?
ironman.q1a_l1: My suit is powered by an Arc Reactor—a clean energy source I designed.
ironman.q1a_l2: Pretty useful when the city’s power grid goes down.
ironman.q1b_l1: No solid evidence yet, but it smells like a classic supervillain move.
ironman.q2_l1: Name’s Tony Stark. Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist... and sometimes Avenger.
ironman.q2_l2: Underneath the suit, I’m just a guy doing his best to protect the world.

blackwidow.l1: You're new around here, aren't you?
blackwidow.l2: Trust no one until you know who they really are.
blackwidow.q1_l1: A coordinated attack wiped out communication and security systems.
blackwidow.q1_l2: Some say it was an inside job.
blackwidow.q1a_l1: Let’s just say I have a knack for finding secrets. Old habits die hard.
blackwidow.q1a_l2: Years of undercover work pay off in times like these.
blackwidow.q1b_l1: In my line of work, trust is earned, not given. I have my suspicions.
blackwidow.q1b_l2: But until I’m sure, I keep my cards close.
blackwidow.q2_l1: I’m Natasha Romanoff, code name Black Widow.
blackwidow.q2_l2: Trained by the Red Room, former S.H.I.E.L.D. agent, and an Avenger.

thor.l1: Greetings, mortal! I sense great trouble brewing in this realm.
thor.l2: I must discover who dares disturb the peace of Midgard.
thor.q1_l1: A mighty storm swept through—unnatural, even by my standards.
thor.q1_l2: There is a presence here I have not felt since the days of Loki.
thor.q1a_l1: Loki is my adopted brother—mischief is in his blood.
thor.q1a_l2: But even he would not risk such chaos without reason.
thor.q1b_l1: With Mjolnir, my enchanted hammer, I shall protect the innocent.
thor.q1b_l2: But I may need aid—your courage will be tested!
thor.q2_l1: I am Thor, son of Odin, Prince of Asgard, God of Thunder.
thor.q2_l2: Protector of this world and many others.

captainamerica.l1: Glad to see a friendly face.
captainamerica.l2: Times like these remind me of old Brooklyn—tough, but never hopeless.
captainamerica.q1_l1: There was panic. Systems failed, and people forgot what matters most: working together.
captainamerica.q1_l2: A city is only as strong as its community.
captainamerica.q1a_l1: No matter how dark things get, there's always a way forward if we stand together.
captainamerica.q1a_l2: I learned that back in 1942, fighting for every inch of freedom.
captainamerica.q1b_l1: Be brave. Do what’s right—even if it’s not easy.
captainamerica.q1b_l2: And remember: I can do this all day.
captainamerica.q2_l1: I’m Steve Rogers, but most know me as Captain America.
captainamerica.q2_l2: Super soldier, shield-bearer, and a believer in justice.

nickfury.l1: Good to see you. Welcome to S.H.I.E.L.D. headquarters.
nickfury.l2: We’ve gathered intel on the threats ahead.
nickfury.q1_l1: You need to recover the stolen super‐soldier serum.
nickfury.q1_l2: Agents report strange activity in the city.
nickfury.q1a_l1: The serum enhances human abilities beyond normal limits.
nickfury.q1b_l1: Signs point to an unknown metahuman attacker.
nickfury.q1b_l2: Stay alert and watch for gamma energy signatures.
nickfury.q2_l1: I’m Nick Fury, director of S.H.I.E.L.D.
nickfury.q2_l2: And yes, this isn’t the ’90s—fashion has changed.

hulk.l1: Ever seen green rage in action?
hulk.l2: You won’t like me when I’m angry.
hulk.q1_l1: A gamma experiment went wrong again.
hulk.q1_l2: Now I'm stuck in this huge green form.
hulk.q1a_l1: A reactor glitch caused a massive gamma overload.
hulk.q1a_l2: It could happen again if I’m not careful.
hulk.q1b_l1: Control is a work in progress.
hulk.q2_l1: Calm me down with a joke.

mariahill.q1_l1: Unstable tech is being smuggled in.

loki.q1a_l2: Trust is a luxury I don’t afford.
loki.q1b_l2: But tricks always come at a price.
loki.q2_l2: And sometimes I serve my own ends.

hawkeye.l2: Name’s Hawkeye. Ready when you are.
hawkeye.q1a_l1: High-tech arrows and a reinforced bow.
hawkeye.q2_l2: And I never miss a shot.
